profile:
Voted Best Home Inspection Company in Toronto by Home Stars!

Best Of HomeStars! - 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018 & 2019!

If you are looking for a reliable and qualified home inspection company with the best services in the Toronto area, only trust the experts at Allmax. Here at Allmax Home Inspections we are the trusted source for home buyers in the area, and we make sure our clients make informed decisions before making the biggest purchase of their lives. Visit: http://allmaxhomes.ca for pricing information. Our team of expert inspectors will be able to see what the other guys can't! We are trained in mold detection and removal. If you are concerned your dream house might be hiding something, make sure to call the experts at Allmax and avoid a nasty surprise! Founded in 2005, AllMax Home and Property Inspections has quickly grown to be the premier inspection service for residential and business properties in the greater Toronto area. We take a customer first approach with our detailed reports and personal touch on each one of our inspections. Our company only hires experienced inspectors that have both inspector experience, as well as building experience for our residential and commercial properties. As the leader in Toronto home inspection services, we here at Allmax will continue to provide to top rated inspection services from our team of experienced inspectors. No matter if you are a first time buyer or looking for investment properties trust the experts at Allmax with your Toronto home inspection. Come see the difference a HomeStars award winning inspector can make to the purchase of your dream home and give the professionals a visit on our website at http://allmaxhomes.ca for more information.

profile:
Due To The Covid-19 Pandemic, 

Wallbank Home Inspections Have Implemented The Government of Canada COVID-19 Recommendations To Our Normal Process Of A Home Inspection To Ensure The Health & Safety Of Our Home Inspectors, Clients, Friends & Family.

We At Wallbank Home Inspections Take Your Safety Seriously, Our Inspectors Wear New Masks, Gloves & Sanitize All Equipment Prior & After Leaving Your Home.
Our Inspectors Are Double Vaccinated + Booster, Experienced, Detailed & Provide First Class Customer Service.

We Respect Your Privacy, Your Family And Your Home, We Also Remove Our Boots At The Front Door! 

We Keep Our Findings In Perspective, The Inspection Usually Lasts 2 1/2 Hours, It Will Consist Of Physically Inspecting And Reporting On The Condition Of The Systems And Components Of The Home. This Consists Of The Structural Foundation, Roof, Exterior, Electrical, Heating & Cooling, Plumbing, Insulation, Ventilation, And Interior Of The Home.

We Love Questions! Lets Discuss Your Next Project!

Thank You For Visiting,

Wallbank Home Inspections
416.930.5139
kevin@wallbankinspections.com
www.wallbankinspections.com

profile:
Twin Peaks Property Inspections is your home inspection partner. Awarded HomeStars Best of 2022.

We've built and renovated homes for over 20 years. That means we have the experience to give you the best inspection. After many home transactions by family and friends, we recognized that home inspections could be done a better way. You deserve the best, that's why our team is trained to the highest standards.

Our services include: Thermal Imaging, Well & Septic Inspections, Sewer Scope Inspections, Pre-Listing Inspection, Home Buyer's Inspection, Pre-Delivery Inspection (PDI), New Home Warranty Inspection (Tarion Warranty). 

We service all of the Greater Toronto Area (GTA) including Ajax, Beaverton, Belleville, Bewdley, Bowmanville, Brampton, Brighton, Cobourg, Courtice, Etobicoke, Hampton, Georgina, Grafton, Lindsay, Markham, Millbrook, Newcastle, Newtonville, Northumberland County, Orono, Oshawa, Peterborough, Pickering, Port Hope, Port Perry, Peel, Pickering, Picton, Scarborough, Scugog, Stouffville, Thornhill, Toronto, Trenton, Uxbridge, Vaughan, Whitby, and surrounding areas.

Call or text (289) 844-7277.

profile: Dive Deep Home Inspections is a residential home inspection company made up of Certified Home Inspectors who have residential construction and renovation experience. Inspectors who know how the systems of your home should actually function. Your home is the largest investment you will make in you lifetime. Whether you are just looking to buy, preparing to sell the one you have, or maybe just looking to make sure its well maintained, let us have a look. Dive Deep Home Inspections only works with Certified Home Inspectors who have past residential construction or renovation experience. We know homes from the ground up. A proper home inspection, sometimes called a Field Performance Review, consists of a visual inspection and tests using the standard operating controls, of the major systems in your home. Systems which include roofing, structure, exterior, interior and insulation, plumbing, electrical, and of course your heating and air conditioning. Don't trust such a detailed inspection to just anyone. Our certified and experienced inspectors know how these systems should function. All inspections are documented in a report, that includes full colour pictures, and diagrams and links that help you to understand your inspectors findings. Your report comes to you by email within 24 hours and you will have access to your inspectors for as long as you need for questions and/or explanations. Let us Dive Deep into your home!
products: Electronic Home Inspection Reports within 24 Hours
services: Pre-Listing Home Inspections, Pre-Purchase Home Inspection, Maintenance Home Inspections
